metadata.name: New Outlook Macro Created
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a macro file for Outlook.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\outlook.exe')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\microsoft\\outlook\\vbaproject.otm')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a macro file for Outlook.

metadata.objective: False positive: User genuinely creates a VB Macro for their email Reference: https://www.mdsec.co.uk/2020/11/a-fresh-outlook-on-mail-based-persistence/
